name: Go Series: Pinball Attack!
description: Pinball Attack is a unique fusion of pinball, exploration and shooting! Control the flippers of a pinball machine in this adventure pinball game as you go on a magical journey to the seabed, under the earth, through a jungle and into space. As the scenery passes by in the background use the pinball to fight off enemies such as a giant blow fish, collect bonuses and powers ups. Reach the end of each level and defeat the boss laying in wait to progress on to the next world. Developed by ArtePiazza.
